item.description:
The Barrington Taxpayers Association will hold a public meeting on January 7th, 2009 at 7:00 PM, at the Barrington Middle School Cafeteria. Doors will open at 6:30 pm for an “Open Enrollment”, and the meeting will start at 7:00 PM.

The recent increase in the property tax rate in Barrington will top the agenda, along with discussions on proposed warrant articles, town and school spending practices, and several other issues that have caused the town’s tax rate increase.

Barrington taxpayers and residents are urged to attend this meeting, as the Taxpayers Association believes that taxes are out of control, and the citizens united can make a difference.

Applications are available at the Town Hall and Post office bulletin boards, on line at www.barringtontaxpayers.org, or by calling 817-9435.
item.name: Barrington Taxpayers Association
